argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idafval.i | |- I = ( IdA ` C ) |
| 2 |  | idafval.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | idafval.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | idahom.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | idahom.h | |- H = ( HomA ` C ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Id ` C ) = ( Id ` C ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 6, 4 | #P_idaval | |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) = <. X , X , ( ( Id ` C ) ` X ) >. ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Hom ` C ) = ( Hom ` C ) |
| 9 | 2, 8, 6, 3, 4 | #P_catidcl | |- ( ph -> ( ( Id ` C ) ` X ) e. ( X ( Hom ` C ) X ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 2, 3, 8, 4, 4, 9 | #P_elhomai2 | |- ( ph -> <. X , X , ( ( Id ` C ) ` X ) >. e. ( X H X ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) e. ( X H X ) ) |
